basics.name: Vikhyath Choradia
basics.label: Senior Consultant Developer at ThoughtWorks
basics.summary:
Explored in the banking, retail and health domain spanning across Mobile, Web and Data Platforms.
 I am a full stack Developer with about six years of experience in Agile methodologies. 
 Worked in Java, R, Android with some smaller contributions in C, Golang etc. 
 Apart from Application development, have also pursued skills in Mobile - apps & DevOps.

awards.title: API Hackthon
awards.summary:
Won the Hackathon by building an application named "Epicures", that helps us find amazing restaurants based on its current reviews.
 We can monitor the performance of a restaurant over a period of time based on its reviews.
 We can see how good it is in terms of food, service, ambience, etc in the recent times.
